basics.name: Aurélien Brachet
basics.label: React Native/ReactJS developer
basics.introduction: Hi, I am Aurelien, a senior ReactJS developer
basics.summary: I am a freelance developer specializing in the ReactJS ecosystem with more than 5 years of experience using React for the web and mobile. Working primarily as a front-end developer with React Native. I have a master's specialized in computer sciences. I have been working on a wide variety of projects, mainly in France but also abroad.

work.name: Prium Solutions
work.description: As a Lead Developer specializing in React JS and React Native, I led the complete overhaul of Prium Portage's internal website, which was burdened by a significant accumulation of technical debt. I conducted the selection process and provided recommendations regarding the technical stack to be adopted, including React Hook Form, Tailwind, Vite, Axios, XState, among others. I established a scalable architecture with unit tests while ensuring the implementation of user interfaces designed by the UI/UX design team. Additionally, I worked on the development from scratch of the Prium One mobile application.

work.name: folk
work.description: One month mission where I was helping to improve the test coverage of the application (Jest & react-testing-library)

work.name: Egis
work.description: Development of a POC for the city of Amsterdam. This was a full remote month project where I have had the opportunity to discover new technologies of the ReactJS ecosystem: - XState, - ZeStand.

work.name: Log'​in Line
work.description: Short-term mission where I assisted in the development of the Fantasy Rugby World application

work.name: Futur composé
work.description: I was working on the Dokki application (https://apps.apple.com/tt/app/dokki-learn-play/id1524772965?ign-mpt=uo%3D2) as lead developer. I took charge of the project for 5 months and I was responsible for making the technical choices for the project. I implemented an architecture where the store was reused between the web app and mobile app part in TDD. I also participated in the formation of juniors and work-study students in the company. Redux, Redux Saga, Jest, Typescript.

work.name: FIDME
work.description:
Fidme est une application avec plus d'un million d'utilisateurs, sur laquelle j'ai pu participé à sa refonte en tant que développeur React Native.
J'ai aussi travaillé avec les technologies Mobx et Jest.

work.name: dotmind
work.description:
Développement de la FFR TV pour le nouveau site de la fédération Française de rugby en ReactJS.
    - https://www.ffr.fr/ffr-tv

work.name: ACTUM Digital
work.description:
Mission de 4 mois à l'étranger, première expérience de travail dans un pays autre
que la France.
Développement d'une application mobile en React Native pour Regiojet, une
entreprise ferroviaire de transport de voyageurs en République tchèque et
Slovaquie. L'application devait lister les tickets en fonction des destinations
choisies, permettre à l'utilisateur de sélectionner une place et d'acheter un
ticket. Elle devait intégrer un mécanisme d'internationalisation.
Technologies:
- React Native
- Redux
- React Intl
- Redux Form
- Redux persist
- Git/GitFlow

Organisation d'une conférence sur le thème des animations en React Native:
- http://y2u.be/jK40958QUT4
Développement de mockup en ReactJS pour des clients d'Actum

education.institution: University of the West of Scotland

education.studyType: Two years technical degree in IT
